subject: Tiếng Anh
description: Medium exercises for Grade 5 English (Lớp 5 Tiếng Anh) - standard practice

exercises.title: Complete the dialogue
exercises.question: A: Where do you live? B: ______

options.A: I live at 123 Le Loi Street, Hanoi.

exercises.hint: When asked 'Where do you live?', answer with your address.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write a short conversation (4-5 sentences) asking and answering about addresses
exercises.question: Write a short conversation (4-5 sentences) asking and answering about addresses
exercises.hint: Use: Where do you live? What's your address? I live in...
exercises.answer: Example: A: Where do you live? B: I live in Ho Chi Minh City. A: What's your address? B: My address is 456 Nguyen Hue Street. A: Is it a house or an apartment? B: It's a house.

exercises.title: Complete the dialogue with appropriate questions
exercises.question: A: What's your address? B: My address is 123 Le Loi Street. A: ______? B: It's a big and modern city.
exercises.hint: We ask 'What's it like?' to know about the characteristics of a place.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write a paragraph (5-6 sentences) describing your neighborhood
exercises.question: Write a paragraph (5-6 sentences) describing your neighborhood
exercises.hint: Include: location, nearby places, what you like about it...
exercises.answer: Example: I live in a nice neighborhood in District 1. There is a park near my house. There are many shops and restaurants nearby. My school is only 5 minutes away. I like my neighborhood because it's safe and convenient. The people here are very friendly.

exercises.title: Câu hỏi vận dụng về Asking and answering about addresses
exercises.question: Câu hỏi vận dụng về Asking and answering about addresses (Câu 11/15)
exercises.hint: Vận dụng kiến thức đã học về Asking and answering about addresses để trả lời.

exercises.title: Trình bày quan điểm về Asking and answering about addresses
exercises.question: Trình bày quan điểm về Asking and answering about addresses (Câu 12/15)
exercises.hint: Vận dụng kiến thức đã học, phân tích và giải thích về Asking and answering about addresses.
exercises.answer: Đây là câu trả lời vận dụng về Asking and answering about addresses. Cần áp dụng kiến thức đã học để giải thích và phân tích. Câu trả lời cần có tính logic và mạch lạc.

exercises.title: Choose the best description
exercises.question: Which sentence best describes a city?

options.A: It is very quiet and small.
options.B: It is big, busy, and has many buildings.

exercises.hint: Cities are usually big, busy places with many buildings.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Compare a city and a village in 4-5 sentences
exercises.question: Compare a city and a village in 4-5 sentences
exercises.hint: Use: big/small, busy/quiet, many buildings/few buildings...
exercises.answer: Example: A city is big and busy. It has many buildings and cars. A village is small and quiet. It has fewer buildings. Many people live in cities, but some people prefer villages.

exercises.title: Choose the best comparative sentence
exercises.question: Which sentence correctly compares a city and a village?

options.A: A city is bigger than a village, but a village is quieter.
options.B: A city is smaller than a village.
options.C: A city and a village are the same.
options.D: A village has more buildings than a city.

exercises.hint: Cities are usually bigger and busier, while villages are quieter.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write about the advantages and disadvantages of living in a city (5-6 sentences)
exercises.question: Write about the advantages and disadvantages of living in a city (5-6 sentences)
exercises.hint: Discuss: facilities, environment, lifestyle...
exercises.answer: Example: Living in a city has both advantages and disadvantages. Cities have many facilities like hospitals and schools. There are more job opportunities. However, cities can be crowded and noisy. The air can be polluted. Some people prefer cities, while others prefer the countryside.

exercises.title: Vận dụng hiểu biết về Describing places
exercises.question: Vận dụng hiểu biết về Describing places (Câu 13/15)
exercises.hint: Vận dụng kiến thức đã học về Describing places để trả lời.

exercises.title: Phân tích ngắn gọn về Describing places
exercises.question: Phân tích ngắn gọn về Describing places (Câu 14/15)
exercises.hint: Vận dụng kiến thức đã học, phân tích và giải thích về Describing places.
exercises.answer: Đây là câu trả lời vận dụng về Describing places. Cần áp dụng kiến thức đã học để giải thích và phân tích. Câu trả lời cần có tính logic và mạch lạc.

exercises.title: Form the correct question
exercises.question: Which question is correct?
exercises.hint: With 'you', we use 'do', not 'does' or 'are'.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write 3 questions and answers about where people live
exercises.question: Write 3 questions and answers about where people live
exercises.hint: Use different question words: Where, What, Who...
exercises.answer: Example: Q: Where do you live? A: I live in Da Nang. Q: What's your address? A: My address is 789 Tran Phu Street. Q: Who do you live with? A: I live with my family.

exercises.title: Phân tích về Grammar: Where do you live?
exercises.question: Phân tích về Grammar: Where do you live? (Câu 15/15)
exercises.hint: Vận dụng kiến thức đã học về Grammar: Where do you live? để trả lời.

chapters.name: I always get up early. How about you?

exercises.title: Put sentences in order
exercises.question: What is the correct order of daily activities?

options.A: Get up → Have breakfast → Go to school → Go to bed
options.B: Go to bed → Get up → Have breakfast → Go to school
options.C: Have breakfast → Get up → Go to school → Go to bed
options.D: Go to school → Get up → Have breakfast → Go to bed

exercises.hint: The correct order: wake up, eat breakfast, go to school, then go to bed at night.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write a paragraph (5-6 sentences) about your daily routine
exercises.question: Write a paragraph (5-6 sentences) about your daily routine
exercises.hint: Use time expressions: in the morning, at noon, in the afternoon, in the evening...
exercises.answer: Example: I get up at 6 o'clock in the morning. I brush my teeth and wash my face. Then I have breakfast at 6:30. I go to school at 7:00. After school, I do my homework. I go to bed at 9:00 in the evening.

exercises.title: Complete the sentence with correct time expressions
exercises.question: I usually get up ______ 6:30 ______ the morning.
exercises.hint: We use 'at' for specific times and 'in' for parts of the day.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Compare your weekday routine with your weekend routine (5-6 sentences)
exercises.question: Compare your weekday routine with your weekend routine (5-6 sentences)
exercises.hint: Compare: wake-up time, activities, schedule...
exercises.answer: Example: My weekday and weekend routines are different. On weekdays, I get up early at 6:00 and go to school. On weekends, I get up later at 8:00. I don't go to school on weekends. I have more free time to play and relax. I prefer weekends because I can do what I like.

exercises.title: Câu hỏi vận dụng về Daily routines
exercises.question: Câu hỏi vận dụng về Daily routines (Câu 11/15)
exercises.hint: Vận dụng kiến thức đã học về Daily routines để trả lời.

exercises.title: Trình bày quan điểm về Daily routines
exercises.question: Trình bày quan điểm về Daily routines (Câu 12/15)
exercises.hint: Vận dụng kiến thức đã học, phân tích và giải thích về Daily routines.
exercises.answer: Đây là câu trả lời vận dụng về Daily routines. Cần áp dụng kiến thức đã học để giải thích và phân tích. Câu trả lời cần có tính logic và mạch lạc.

exercises.title: Choose the correct frequency adverb
exercises.question: I ______ watch TV. (I watch TV every day)
exercises.hint: If you do something every day, you 'always' do it.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write sentences about your habits using different frequency adverbs
exercises.question: Write sentences about your habits using different frequency adverbs
exercises.hint: Use: always, usually, often, sometimes, rarely, never
exercises.answer: Example: I always brush my teeth. I usually have breakfast. I often play football. I sometimes watch TV. I never go to bed late.

exercises.title: Choose the correct frequency adverb based on context
exercises.question: I ______ go to the library. (I go there every day)
exercises.hint: If you do something every day, you 'always' do it.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write about your family members' habits using frequency adverbs (5-6 sentences)
exercises.question: Write about your family members' habits using frequency adverbs (5-6 sentences)
exercises.hint: Describe what each person does and how often...
exercises.answer: Example: My family members have different habits. My father always reads the newspaper in the morning. My mother usually cooks dinner. My brother often plays video games. I sometimes help with housework. My little sister never stays up late.

exercises.title: Vận dụng hiểu biết về Talking about frequency
exercises.question: Vận dụng hiểu biết về Talking about frequency (Câu 13/15)
exercises.hint: Vận dụng kiến thức đã học về Talking about frequency để trả lời.

exercises.title: Phân tích ngắn gọn về Talking about frequency
exercises.question: Phân tích ngắn gọn về Talking about frequency (Câu 14/15)
exercises.hint: Vận dụng kiến thức đã học, phân tích và giải thích về Talking about frequency.

exercises.title: Place the adverb correctly
exercises.question: Which sentence is correct?
exercises.hint: Adverbs of frequency usually go before the main verb.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write 5 sentences about what you always, usually, often, sometimes, and never do
exercises.question: Write 5 sentences about what you always, usually, often, sometimes, and never do
exercises.hint: Use each frequency adverb once.
exercises.answer: Example: I always go to school. I usually have lunch at home. I often play with friends. I sometimes read books. I never skip breakfast.

exercises.title: Phân tích về Grammar: Adverbs of frequency
exercises.question: Phân tích về Grammar: Adverbs of frequency (Câu 15/15)
exercises.hint: Vận dụng kiến thức đã học về Grammar: Adverbs of frequency để trả lời.

chapters.name: Where did you go on holiday?

exercises.title: Choose the correct past tense form
exercises.question: Yesterday, I ______ to the zoo with my family.
exercises.hint: We use 'went' (past tense of 'go') when talking about the past.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write a paragraph (5-6 sentences) about what you did last weekend
exercises.question: Write a paragraph (5-6 sentences) about what you did last weekend
exercises.hint: Use past tense verbs: went, played, visited, watched, ate...
exercises.answer: Example: Last weekend, I went to the park with my family. We played football together. Then we visited my grandparents. We had lunch together. In the afternoon, I watched a movie. I had a great time.

exercises.title: Complete the story with correct past tense forms
exercises.question: Last month, I ______ to the museum. I ______ many interesting things. I ______ many photos.
exercises.hint: All verbs should be in past tense: went, saw, took.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write a story about a memorable trip (6-7 sentences)
exercises.question: Write a story about a memorable trip (6-7 sentences)
exercises.hint: Include: when, where, who with, what you did, how you felt...
exercises.answer: Example: Last summer, I went to Ha Long Bay with my family. We traveled by car. When we arrived, I saw the beautiful bay. We took a boat trip. We visited amazing caves. We swam in the sea. I had a wonderful time and took many photos.

exercises.title: Câu hỏi vận dụng về Past simple tense
exercises.question: Câu hỏi vận dụng về Past simple tense (Câu 11/15)
exercises.hint: Vận dụng kiến thức đã học về Past simple tense để trả lời.

exercises.title: Trình bày quan điểm về Past simple tense
exercises.question: Trình bày quan điểm về Past simple tense (Câu 12/15)

exercises.title: Answer the question about holidays
exercises.question: Where did you go on holiday?

options.A: I went to Da Lat last summer.
options.B: I go to Da Lat every summer.
options.C: I will go to Da Lat next summer.
options.D: I am going to Da Lat.

exercises.hint: The question asks about the past, so use past tense.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write about your last holiday (6-7 sentences)
exercises.question: Write about your last holiday (6-7 sentences)
exercises.hint: Include: where you went, when, who with, what you did, how you felt...
exercises.answer: Example: Last summer, I went to Da Lat with my family. We went there by car. We visited many beautiful places like Xuan Huong Lake and the flower garden. We took many photos. We ate delicious food. I had a wonderful time. I want to go there again.

exercises.title: Answer complex questions about past events
exercises.question: A: Where did you go last weekend? B: I went to the zoo. A: ______? B: I went with my parents. We saw elephants.

options.A: Who did you go with and what did you see

exercises.hint: The answer mentions 'with my parents' (who) and 'saw elephants' (what), so the question should ask about both.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Compare two different holidays you had (6-7 sentences)
exercises.question: Compare two different holidays you had (6-7 sentences)
exercises.hint: Compare: destinations, activities, which one you preferred...
exercises.answer: Example: I have had two memorable holidays. Last summer, I went to the beach. We swam and played on the beach. Last winter, I went to the mountains. We went hiking and saw snow. Both holidays were amazing but different. I think I preferred the mountain holiday because it was something new.

exercises.title: Vận dụng hiểu biết về Talking about holidays
exercises.question: Vận dụng hiểu biết về Talking about holidays (Câu 13/15)

lessons.title: Grammar: Past simple with regular and irregular verbs

exercises.title: Identify regular and irregular verbs
exercises.question: Which verb is irregular?
exercises.hint: 'Went' is the past tense of 'go' - it's irregular because it doesn't follow the -ed pattern.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write sentences using both regular and irregular past tense verbs
exercises.question: Write sentences using both regular and irregular past tense verbs
exercises.hint: Regular: played, visited, watched. Irregular: went, saw, ate, had.
exercises.answer: Example: Yesterday I played football. Then I went to the park. I visited my friend. I saw a beautiful bird. I ate ice cream. I had a great day.

exercises.title: Phân tích về Grammar: Past simple with regular and irregular verbs
exercises.question: Phân tích về Grammar: Past simple with regular and irregular verbs (Câu 15/15)
exercises.hint: Vận dụng kiến thức đã học về Grammar: Past simple with regular and irregular verbs để trả lời.

exercises.title: Match health problems with symptoms
exercises.question: If you have a headache, you should:
exercises.hint: When you have a headache, you should rest and drink water.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write a dialogue (6-7 sentences) about health problems
exercises.question: Write a dialogue (6-7 sentences) about health problems
exercises.hint: Use: What's the matter? I have a..., You should/shouldn't...
exercises.answer: Example: A: What's the matter with you? B: I have a headache. A: You should rest. B: Should I take medicine? A: Yes, you should. B: Thank you. A: You're welcome. Get well soon!

exercises.title: Choose appropriate advice for multiple symptoms
exercises.question: A: What's the matter? B: I have a fever and a cough. A: ______

options.A: You should rest, take medicine, and drink warm water.

exercises.hint: For fever and cough, you should rest, take medicine, and drink warm water.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write a role-play dialogue between a doctor and a patient (7-8 sentences)
exercises.question: Write a role-play dialogue between a doctor and a patient (7-8 sentences)
exercises.hint: Include: greeting, asking about symptoms, giving advice...
exercises.answer: Example: Doctor: What's the matter? Patient: I have a stomachache. Doctor: What did you eat? Patient: I ate a lot of spicy food. Doctor: You should rest. You should drink water. You shouldn't eat spicy food. Patient: Should I take medicine? Doctor: Yes, I'll give you some. Patient: Thank you, doctor.

exercises.title: Câu hỏi vận dụng về Health problems
exercises.question: Câu hỏi vận dụng về Health problems (Câu 11/15)
exercises.hint: Vận dụng kiến thức đã học về Health problems để trả lời.

exercises.title: Trình bày quan điểm về Health problems
exercises.question: Trình bày quan điểm về Health problems (Câu 12/15)
exercises.hint: Vận dụng kiến thức đã học, phân tích và giải thích về Health problems.
exercises.answer: Đây là câu trả lời vận dụng về Health problems. Cần áp dụng kiến thức đã học để giải thích và phân tích. Câu trả lời cần có tính logic và mạch lạc.

exercises.title: Choose appropriate advice
exercises.question: I have a toothache. What should I do?
exercises.hint: For a toothache, you should see a dentist.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write advice for different health problems (4-5 sentences)
exercises.question: Write advice for different health problems (4-5 sentences)
exercises.hint: Use: If you have..., you should/shouldn't...
exercises.answer: Example: If you have a headache, you should rest. If you have a fever, you should take medicine. If you have a cold, you should drink warm water. If you have a toothache, you should see a dentist. You shouldn't eat too much candy.

exercises.title: Match health problems with appropriate advice
exercises.question: I have a sore throat. What should I do?

options.A: You should rest your voice, drink warm water, and see a doctor if needed.

exercises.hint: For a sore throat, you should rest your voice, drink warm liquids, and see a doctor if needed.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write a health guide about preventing common health problems (6-7 sentences)
exercises.question: Write a health guide about preventing common health problems (6-7 sentences)
exercises.hint: Discuss: prevention methods, healthy habits, what to avoid...
exercises.answer: Example: To stay healthy, you should eat fruits and vegetables. You should drink plenty of water. You should exercise regularly. You should get enough sleep. You should wash your hands before eating. However, you shouldn't eat too much junk food. You shouldn't stay up late. Following these rules will help you stay healthy.

exercises.title: Vận dụng hiểu biết về Giving advice
exercises.question: Vận dụng hiểu biết về Giving advice (Câu 13/15)
exercises.hint: Vận dụng kiến thức đã học về Giving advice để trả lời.

exercises.hint: Vận dụng kiến thức đã học, phân tích và giải thích về Giving advice.

exercises.title: Form correct advice sentences
exercises.question: Which sentence is correct?

options.A: You should eat fruits and vegetables.
options.B: You should to eat fruits and vegetables.
options.C: You should eating fruits and vegetables.
options.D: You should eats fruits and vegetables.

exercises.hint: After 'should', we use the base form of the verb (eat, not to eat, eating, or eats).

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write 5 sentences about healthy habits using 'should' and 'shouldn't'
exercises.question: Write 5 sentences about healthy habits using 'should' and 'shouldn't'
exercises.hint: Include both positive (should) and negative (shouldn't) advice.
exercises.answer: Example: You should exercise every day. You should eat fruits and vegetables. You should drink plenty of water. You shouldn't eat too much junk food. You shouldn't stay up late.

exercises.title: Phân tích về Grammar: Should/Shouldn't
exercises.question: Phân tích về Grammar: Should/Shouldn't (Câu 15/15)
exercises.hint: Vận dụng kiến thức đã học về Grammar: Should/Shouldn't để trả lời.
